title: Standard Deviation
text: 68% of the values should be within $$1$$ standard deviation of the mean.
speech: 68% of the values should be within  1  standard deviation of the mean.
pacedSpeech: 68% of the values should be within   1

title: Z-scores
text: The $$z-scores$$ that correspond to being within $$1$$ standard deviation of the mean are $$-1$$ and $$1$$.
speech: The  z minus, scores  that correspond to being within  1  standard deviation of the mean are  negative 1  and  1 .
pacedSpeech: standard deviation of the mean are   negative 1
